title: Textile, 1400–1600
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: rib weave; complementary warps; Section A: Complimentary warps, plain weave with inner wefts; Section B: Transposed warps; Section C: Warp faced plain weave
description: Horizontal bands filled with starts alternating in dark blue on half tan half natural background and contrasting light and dark values. Red bands between ornamented stripes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1400–1600.Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: rib weave; complementary warps; Section A: Complimentary warps, plain weave with inner wefts; Section B: Transposed warps; Section C: Warp faced plain weave. 1949-118-6.
